title: Item Sets
body: Can you still make item sets in  the client update? I'm just wondering because there are some that I want to edit because the build doesn't work anymore since the reworks. If you can, can you please tell me how to do it?

replies.body:
Item sets will be in the new client eventually.

The feature doesn't exist now because almost no one uses it.

You can use item sets by following this formula:

1. Create an item set in the OLD client.
2. Play a custom game with that item set, in the OLD client.
3. Then play your game in the NEW client.

That should allow you to use the item sets in the new client, but you cant make/edit them unless you re-open the old client.
